It might have been very serious . But [you]142-lucia were so sensible and brave — so unlike [the girls of [my]128-miss bartlett day]3328-the girls of my day . ”[128-miss bartlett]

“ Let ’s go down to [them]3328-the girls of my day . ”[129-lucy]

But , once in the open air , [she]129-lucy paused . Some emotion — pity , terror , love , but the emotion was strong — seized [her]129-lucy , and [she]129-lucy was aware of autumn . Summer was ending , and the evening brought [her]129-lucy odours of decay , the more pathetic because they were reminiscent of spring . That something or other mattered intellectually ? A leaf , violently agitated , danced past [her]129-lucy , while other leaves lay motionless . That [the earth]2344-the earth was hastening to re - enter darkness , and the shadows of those trees over [Windy Corner]14-windy corner ?

“ Hullo , [Lucy]129-lucy ! There ’s still light enough for another set , if [you]142-lucia two’ll hurry . ”[256-cecil]

“ [Mr. Emerson]126-george has had to go . ”[256-cecil]

“ What a nuisance ! That spoils the four . [I]256-cecil say , [Cecil]256-cecil , do play , do , there ’s [a good chap]3329-a good chap . It ’s [Floyd]277-mr. floyd ’s last day . Do play tennis with [us]3330-us , just this once . ”[256-cecil]

[Cecil]256-cecil ’s voice came : “ [[My]256-cecil dear]2232-my dear [Freddy]135-freddy , [I]256-cecil am [no athlete]3332-no athlete . As [you]135-freddy well remarked this very morning , ‘ There are [some chaps who are no good for anything but books ’]3333-some chaps who are no good for anything but books ’ ; [I]256-cecil plead guilty to being such [a chap]3334-a chap , and will not inflict [myself]256-cecil on [you]135-freddy . ”[256-cecil]

The scales fell from [Lucy]129-lucy ’s eyes . How had [she]129-lucy stood [Cecil]256-cecil for a moment ? [He]256-cecil was absolutely intolerable , and the same evening [she]129-lucy broke off [her]129-lucy engagement .

Chapter XVII Lying to [Cecil]256-cecil

[He]256-cecil was bewildered . [He]256-cecil had nothing to say . [He]256-cecil was not even angry , but stood , with a glass of whiskey between [his]256-cecil hands , trying to think what had led [her]129-lucy to such a conclusion .

[She]129-lucy had chosen the moment before bed , when , in accordance with [their]1805-their bourgeois habit , [she]129-lucy always dispensed drinks to [the men]1578-the men . [Freddy]135-freddy and [Mr. Floyd]277-mr. floyd were sure to retire with [their]1805-their glasses , while [Cecil]256-cecil invariably lingered , sipping at [his]256-cecil while [she]129-lucy locked up the sideboard .

“ [I]129-lucy am very sorry about it , ”[129-lucy] [she]129-lucy said ; “ [I]129-lucy have carefully thought things over . [We]3335-we are too different . [I]129-lucy must ask [you]1578-the men to release [me]129-lucy , and try to forget that there ever was [such a foolish girl]3336-such a foolish girl . ”[129-lucy]

It was a suitable speech , but [she]129-lucy was more angry than sorry , and [her]129-lucy voice showed it .

“ Different — how — how — ”[129-lucy]

“ [I]129-lucy have n’t had a really good education , for one thing , ”[129-lucy] [she]129-lucy continued , still on [her]129-lucy knees by the sideboard . “ [My]129-lucy Italian trip came too late , and [I]129-lucy am forgetting all that [I]129-lucy learnt there . [I]129-lucy shall never be able to talk to [[your]1578-the men friends]3337-your friends , or behave as [a wife of yours]3338-a wife of yours should . ”[129-lucy]

“ [I]129-lucy do n’t understand [you]1578-the men . [You]1578-the men are n’t like [yourself]1578-the men . [You]1578-the men ’re tired , [Lucy]129-lucy . ”[129-lucy]

“ Tired ! ”[129-lucy] [she]129-lucy retorted , kindling at once . “ That is exactly like [you]1578-the men . [You]1578-the men always think [women]2187-women do n’t mean what [they]2187-women say . ”[129-lucy]

“ Well , [you]1578-the men sound tired , as if something has worried [you]1578-the men . ”[129-lucy]

“ What if [I]129-lucy do ? It does n’t prevent [me]129-lucy from realizing the truth . [I]129-lucy ca n’t marry [you]1578-the men , and [you]1578-the men will thank [me]129-lucy for saying so some day . ”[129-lucy]

“ [You]1807-i had that bad headache yesterday — All right”—for[129-lucy] [she]129-lucy had exclaimed indignantly : “ [I]129-lucy see it ’s much more than headaches . But give [me]129-lucy a moment ’s time . ”[129-lucy] [He]1807-i closed [his]1807-i eyes . “ [You]1578-the men must excuse [me]1807-i if [I]1807-i say stupid things , but [my]1807-i brain has gone to pieces . Part of it lives three minutes back , when [I]1807-i was sure that [you]1578-the men loved [me]1807-i , and the other part — [I]1807-i find it difficult — [I]1807-i am likely to say the wrong thing . ”[1807-i]

It struck [her]129-lucy that [he]1807-i was not behaving so badly , and [her]129-lucy irritation increased . [She]129-lucy again desired a struggle , not a discussion . To bring on the crisis , [she]129-lucy said :

“ There are days when [one]424-one sees clearly , and this is one of them . Things must come to a breaking - point some time , and it happens to be to - day . If [you]1578-the men want to know , quite a little thing decided [me]129-lucy to speak to [you]1578-the men — when [you]1578-the men would n’t play tennis with [Freddy]135-freddy . ”[129-lucy]

“ [I]256-cecil never do play tennis , ”[256-cecil] said [Cecil]256-cecil , painfully bewildered ; “ [I]256-cecil never could play . [I]256-cecil do n’t understand a word [you]1578-the men say . ”[256-cecil]

“ [You]1578-the men can play well enough to make up a four . [I]129-lucy thought it abominably selfish of [you]1578-the men . ”[129-lucy]

“ No , [I]256-cecil can’t — well , never mind the tennis . Why could n’t [you]1578-the men — couldn’t [you]1578-the men have warned [me]256-cecil if [you]1578-the men felt anything wrong ? [You]1578-the men talked of [our]3341-our wedding at lunch — at least , [you]1578-the men let [me]256-cecil talk . ”[256-cecil]

“ [I]129-lucy knew [you]1578-the men would n’t understand , ”[129-lucy] said [Lucy]129-lucy quite crossly . “ [I]129-lucy might have known there would have been these dreadful explanations . Of course , it is n’t the tennis — that was only the last straw to all [I]129-lucy have been feeling for weeks . Surely it was better not to speak until [I]129-lucy felt certain . ”[129-lucy] [She]129-lucy developed this position . “ Often before [I]129-lucy have wondered if [I]129-lucy was fitted for [[your]1578-the men wife]3342-your wife — for instance , in [London]9-london ; and are [you]1578-the men fitted to be [[my]129-lucy husband]3343-my husband ? [I]129-lucy do n’t think so . [You]1578-the men do n’t like [Freddy]135-freddy , nor [[my]129-lucy mother]2718-my mother . There was always a lot against [our]3345-our engagement , [Cecil]256-cecil , but all [our]3345-our relations seemed pleased , and [we]3345-our met so often , and it was no good mentioning it until — well , until all things came to a point . [They]3346-they have to - day . [I]129-lucy see clearly . [I]129-lucy must speak . That ’s all . ”[129-lucy]

“ [I]256-cecil can not think [you]256-cecil were right , ”[256-cecil] said [Cecil]256-cecil gently . “ [I]256-cecil can not tell why , but though all that [you]256-cecil say sounds true , [I]256-cecil feel that [you]256-cecil are not treating [me]256-cecil fairly . It ’s all too horrible . ”[256-cecil]

“ What ’s the good of a scene ? ”[129-lucy]

“ No good . But surely [I]256-cecil have a right to hear a little more . ”[256-cecil]

[He]256-cecil put down [his]256-cecil glass and opened the window . From where [she]1808-i knelt , jangling [her]1808-i keys , [she]1808-i could see a slit of darkness , and , peering into it , as if it would tell [him]256-cecil that “ little more , ”[129-lucy] [his]256-cecil long , thoughtful face .

“ Do n’t open the window ; and [you]256-cecil ’d better draw the curtain , too ; [Freddy]135-freddy or [any one]397-any one might be outside . ”[256-cecil] [He]256-cecil obeyed . “ [I]256-cecil really think [we]3348-we had better go to bed , if [you]256-cecil do n’t mind . [I]256-cecil shall only say things that will make [me]256-cecil unhappy afterwards . As [you]256-cecil say it is all too horrible , and it is no good talking . ”[256-cecil]

But to [Cecil]256-cecil , now that [he]256-cecil was about to lose [her]1808-i , [she]1808-i seemed each moment more desirable . [He]256-cecil looked at [her]1808-i , instead of through [her]1808-i , for the first time since [they]1809-they were engaged . From a Leonardo [she]1808-i had become [a living woman]1810-a living woman , with mysteries and forces of [her]1808-i own , with qualities that even eluded art . [His]256-cecil brain recovered from the shock , and , in a burst of genuine devotion , [he]256-cecil cried : “ But [I]256-cecil love [you]1808-i , and [I]256-cecil did think [you]1808-i loved [me]256-cecil ! ”[256-cecil]

“ [I]1808-i did not , ”[1808-i] [she]1808-i said . “ [I]1808-i thought [I]1808-i did at first . [I]1808-i am sorry , and ought to have refused [you]256-cecil this last time , too . ”[1808-i]

[He]256-cecil began to walk up and down [the room]373-the room , and [she]1808-i grew more and more vexed at [his]256-cecil dignified behaviour . [She]1808-i had counted on [his]256-cecil being petty . It would have made things easier for [her]1808-i . By a cruel irony [she]1808-i was drawing out all that was finest in [his]256-cecil disposition .

“ [You]256-cecil do n’t love [me]1808-i , evidently . [I]1808-i dare say [you]256-cecil are right not to . But it would hurt a little less if [I]1808-i knew why . ”[1808-i]

“ Because”—a[256-cecil] phrase came to [her]1808-i , and [she]1808-i accepted it—“you’re the sort who ca n’t know [any one]397-any one intimately . ”[256-cecil]

A horrified look came into [his]256-cecil eyes .

“ [I]1808-i do n’t mean exactly that . But [you]256-cecil will question [me]1808-i , though [I]1808-i beg [you]256-cecil not to , and [I]1808-i must say something . It is that , more or less . When [we]3350-we were only [acquaintances]3351-acquaintances , [you]256-cecil let [me]1808-i be [myself]1808-i , but now [you]256-cecil ’re always protecting [me]1808-i . ”[1808-i] [Her]1808-i voice swelled . “ [I]1808-i wo n’t be protected . [I]1808-i will choose for [myself]1808-i what is ladylike and right . To shield [me]1808-i is an insult . Ca n’t [I]1808-i be trusted to face the truth but [I]1808-i must get it second - hand through [you]256-cecil ? [A woman]1257-a woman ’s place ! [You]256-cecil despise [[my]1808-i mother]2718-my mother — [I]1808-i know [you]256-cecil do — because [she]1808-i ’s conventional and bothers over puddings ; but , oh [goodness!”—she]303-goodness!”—she[1808-i] rose to [her]1808-i feet—“conventional , [Cecil]256-cecil , [you]256-cecil ’re that , for [you]256-cecil may understand beautiful things , but [you]256-cecil do n’t know how to use them ; and [you]256-cecil wrap [yourself]256-cecil up in art and books and music , and would try to wrap up [me]1808-i . [I]1808-i wo n’t be stifled , not by the most glorious music , for [people]354-people are more glorious , and [you]256-cecil hide them from [me]1808-i . That ’s why [I]1808-i break off [my]1808-i engagement . [You]256-cecil were all right as long as [you]256-cecil kept to things , but when [you]256-cecil came to [people]354-people — ”[1808-i] [She]1808-i stopped .

There was a pause . Then [Cecil]256-cecil said with great emotion :

“ It is true . ”[256-cecil]

“ True on the whole , ”[1808-i] [she]1808-i corrected , full of some vague shame .

“ True , every word . It is a revelation . It is — [I.]256-cecil ”[256-cecil]

“ Anyhow , those are [my]256-cecil reasons for not being [[your]1808-i wife]3342-your wife . ”[256-cecil]

[He]256-cecil repeated : “ ‘ The sort that can know [no one]2230-no one intimately . ’ It is true . [I]256-cecil fell to pieces the very first day [we]3358-we were engaged . [I]256-cecil behaved like [a cad to [Beebe]248-minnie and to [[your]1808-i brother]2661-your brother]3359-a cad to beebe and to your brother . [You]1808-i are even greater than [I]256-cecil thought . ”[256-cecil] [She]1808-i withdrew a step . “ [I]1808-i ’m not going to worry [you]256-cecil . [You]1808-i are far too good to [me]1808-i . [I]1808-i shall never forget [your]1808-i insight ; and , dear , [I]1808-i only blame [you]1808-i for this : [you]1808-i might have warned [me]1808-i in the early stages , before [you]1808-i felt [you]1808-i would n’t marry [me]1808-i , and so have given [me]1808-i a chance to improve . [I]1808-i have never known [you]1808-i till this evening . [I]1808-i have just used [you]1808-i as a peg for [my]1808-i silly notions of what [a woman]1257-a woman should be . But this evening [you]1808-i are [a different person]3295-a different person : new thoughts — even a new voice — ”[1808-i]

“ What do [you]1808-i mean by a new voice ? ”[1812-she] [she]1812-she asked , seized with incontrollable anger .

“ [I]1813-you mean that [a new person]3363-a new person seems speaking through [you]1812-she , ”[1813-you] said [he]1813-you .

Then [she]1812-she lost [her]1812-she balance . [She]1812-she cried : “ If [you]1813-you think [I]1812-she am in love with [some one else]3364-some one else , [you]1813-you are very much mistaken . ”[1812-she]

“ Of course [I]1808-i do n’t think that . [You]1808-i are not that kind , [Lucy]129-lucy . ”[1808-i]

“ Oh , yes , [you]1808-i do think it . It ’s [your]1808-i old idea , the idea that has kept [Europe]49-europe back — [I]1812-she mean the idea that [women]2187-women are always thinking of [men]2188-men . If [a girl]560-a girl breaks off [her]560-a girl engagement , [everyone]2229-everyone says : ‘ Oh , [she]560-a girl had [someone else]3318-someone else in [her]560-a girl mind ; [she]560-a girl hopes to get [someone else]3318-someone else . ’ It ’s disgusting , brutal ! As if [a girl]560-a girl ca n’t break it off for the sake of freedom . ”[1812-she]

[He]1814-i answered reverently : “ [I]1814-i may have said that in the past . [I]1814-i shall never say it again . [You]129-lucy have taught [me]1814-i better . ”[1814-i]

[She]1815-she began to redden , and pretended to examine the windows again .

“ Of course , there is no question of ‘ [someone else ’]3372-someone else ’ in this , no ‘ jilting ’ or any such nauseous stupidity . [I]1808-i beg [your]129-lucy pardon most humbly if [my]1808-i words suggested that there was . [I]1808-i only meant that there was a force in [you]129-lucy that [I]1808-i had n’t known of up till now . ”[1808-i]

“ All right , [Cecil]256-cecil , that will do . Do n’t apologize to [me]1816-i . It was [my]1816-i mistake . ”[1816-i]

“ It is a question between ideals , [yours]129-lucy and [mine]1808-i — pure abstract ideals , and [yours]129-lucy are the nobler . [I]1816-i was bound up in the old vicious notions , and all the time [you]129-lucy were splendid and new . ”[1816-i] [His]1816-i voice broke . “ [I]1816-i must actually thank [you]129-lucy for what [you]129-lucy have done — for showing [me]1816-i what [I]1816-i really am . [Solemnly]305-solemnly , [I]1816-i thank [you]129-lucy for showing [me]1816-i [a true woman]3373-a true woman . Will [you]129-lucy shake hands ? ”[1816-i]

“ Of course [I]129-lucy will , ”[129-lucy] said [Lucy]129-lucy , twisting up [her]129-lucy other hand in the curtains . “ Good - night , [Cecil]256-cecil . Good - bye . That ’s all right . [I]129-lucy ’m sorry about it . Thank [you]129-lucy very much for [your]129-lucy gentleness . ”[129-lucy]

“ Let [me]1817-me light [your]129-lucy candle , shall [I]1817-me ? ”[1817-me]

[They]1817-me went into [the hall]1818-the hall .

“ Thank [you]129-lucy . Good - night again . God bless [you]129-lucy , [Lucy]129-lucy ! ”[1817-me]

“ Good - bye , [Cecil]256-cecil . ”[1817-me]

[She]129-lucy watched [him]1819-his steal [up - stairs]1820-up - stairs , while the shadows from three banisters passed over [her]129-lucy face like the beat of wings . On [the landing]1821-the landing [he]1819-his paused strong in [his]1819-his renunciation , and gave [her]129-lucy a look of memorable beauty . For all [his]1819-his culture , [Cecil]256-cecil was [an ascetic at heart]1822-an ascetic at heart , and nothing in [his]256-cecil love became [him]256-cecil like the leaving of it .

[She]129-lucy could never marry . In the tumult of [her]129-lucy soul , that stood firm . [Cecil]256-cecil believed in [her]129-lucy ; [she]129-lucy must some day believe in [herself]129-lucy . [She]129-lucy must be [one of [the women whom [she]129-lucy had praised so eloquently , who care for liberty and not for [men]2188-men]1824-the women whom she had praised so eloquently , who care for liberty and not for men]1823-one of the women whom she had praised so eloquently , who care for liberty and not for men ; [she]129-lucy must forget that [George]126-george loved [her]129-lucy , that [George]126-george had been thinking through [her]129-lucy and gained [her]129-lucy this honourable release , that [George]126-george had gone away into — what was it?—the darkness .

[She]129-lucy put out the lamp .

It did not do to think , nor , for the matter of that , to feel . [She]129-lucy gave up trying to understand [herself]129-lucy , and joined the vast armies of the benighted , who follow neither the heart nor the brain , and march to [their]1826-their destiny by catch - words . [The armies]1827-the armies are full of [pleasant and pious folk]1828-pleasant and pious folk . But [they]1827-the armies have yielded to the only enemy that matters — the enemy within . [They]1827-the armies have sinned against passion and truth , and vain will be [their]1827-the armies strife after virtue . As the years pass , [they]1827-the armies are censured . [Their]1827-the armies pleasantry and [their]1827-the armies piety show cracks , [their]1827-the armies wit becomes cynicism , [their]1827-the armies unselfishness hypocrisy ; [they]1827-the armies feel and produce discomfort wherever [they]1827-the armies go . [They]1827-the armies have sinned against [Eros]100-eros and against [Pallas Athene]101-pallas athene , and not by any heavenly intervention , but by the ordinary course of nature , [those allied deities]1829-those allied deities will be avenged .

[Lucy]129-lucy entered this army when [she]129-lucy pretended to [George]126-george that [she]129-lucy did not love [him]126-george , and pretended to [Cecil]256-cecil that [she]129-lucy loved [no one]2230-no one . The night received [her]129-lucy , as it had received [Miss Bartlett]128-miss bartlett thirty years before .

Chapter XVIII Lying to [Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe , [Mrs. Honeychurch]134-mrs. honeychurch , [Freddy]135-freddy , and [The Servants

Windy Corner]1831-the servants windy corner lay , not on [the summit of [the ridge]1833-the ridge]1832-the summit of the ridge , but a few hundred feet down the southern slope , at the springing of one of the great buttresses that supported [the hill]936-the hill . On either side of [it]1835-it was [a shallow ravine , filled with ferns and pine - trees]1836-a shallow ravine , filled with ferns and pine - trees , and down [the ravine on the left]1837-the ravine on the left ran [the highway]1838-the highway into [the Weald]36-the weald .

[Whenever Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe crossed [the ridge]1833-the ridge and caught sight of these noble dispositions of [the earth]2344-the earth , and , poised in the middle of them , [Windy Corner,—he]306-windy corner,—he laughed . The situation was so glorious , [the house]928-the house so commonplace , not to say impertinent . [The late Mr. Honeychurch]247-mr. honeychurch had affected [the cube]1842-the cube , because it gave [him]247-mr. honeychurch the most accommodation for [his]247-mr. honeychurch money , and the only addition made by [[his]247-mr. honeychurch widow]1843-his widow had been [a small turret , shaped like a rhinoceros ’ horn , where [she]1843-his widow could sit in wet weather and watch [the carts]1845-the carts going up and down [the road]455-the road]1844-a small turret , shaped like a rhinoceros ’ horn , where she could sit in wet weather and watch the carts going up and down the road . So impertinent — and yet [the house]928-the house “ did , ”[1852-expensive architects] for [it]928-the house was the home of people who loved [[their]1848-their surroundings]1849-their surroundings honestly . [Other houses in [the neighborhood]1851-the neighborhood]1850-other houses in the neighborhood had been built by [expensive architects]1852-expensive architects , over others [[their]1852-expensive architects inmates]1853-their inmates had fidgeted sedulously , yet all these suggested the accidental , the temporary ; while [Windy Corner]14-windy corner seemed as inevitable as an ugliness of Nature ’s own creation . [One]424-one might laugh at [the house]928-the house , but [one]424-one never shuddered . [Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe was bicycling over this Monday afternoon with a piece of gossip . [He]133-mr. beebe had heard from [the Miss Alans]171-the miss alans . [These admirable ladies]1857-these admirable ladies , since [they]1857-these admirable ladies could not go to [Cissie Villa]228-cissie villa , had changed [their]1857-these admirable ladies plans . [They]1857-these admirable ladies were going to [Greece]102-greece instead .

“ Since [Florence]22-florence did [[my]167-miss alan poor sister]3374-my poor sister so much good , ”[167-miss alan] wrote [Miss Catharine]167-miss alan , “ [we]1857-these admirable ladies do not see why [we]1857-these admirable ladies should not try [Athens]48-athens this winter . Of course , [Athens]48-athens is a plunge , and [the doctor]3375-the doctor has ordered [her]3374-my poor sister special digestive bread ; but , after all , [we]1857-these admirable ladies can take that with [us]1857-these admirable ladies , and it is only getting first into [a steamer]3376-a steamer and then into [a train]3377-a train . But is there [an English Church]3378-an english church ? ”[167-miss alan] And the letter went on to say : “ [I]167-miss alan do not expect [we]1857-these admirable ladies shall go any further than [Athens]48-athens , but if [you]129-lucy knew of a really comfortable pension at [Constantinople]103-constantinople , [we]1857-these admirable ladies should be so grateful . ”[167-miss alan]

[Lucy]129-lucy would enjoy this letter , and the smile with which [Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe greeted [Windy Corner]14-windy corner was partly for [her]129-lucy . [She]129-lucy would see the fun of it , and some of its beauty , for [she]129-lucy must see some beauty . Though [she]129-lucy was hopeless about pictures , and though [she]129-lucy dressed so unevenly — oh , that cerise frock yesterday at church!—she must see some beauty in life , or [she]129-lucy could not play the piano as [she]129-lucy did . [He]133-mr. beebe had a theory that [musicians]1858-musicians are incredibly complex , and know far less than [other artists]1859-other artists what [they]1858-musicians want and what [they]1858-musicians are ; that [they]1858-musicians puzzle [themselves]1858-musicians as well as [[their]1858-musicians friends]1860-their friends ; that [their]1858-musicians psychology is a modern development , and has not yet been understood . This theory , had [he]133-mr. beebe known it , had possibly just been illustrated by facts . Ignorant of the events of yesterday [he]133-mr. beebe was only riding over to get some tea , to see [[his]133-mr. beebe niece]1389-his niece , and to observe whether [Miss Honeychurch]129-lucy saw anything beautiful in the desire of [two old ladies]1862-two old ladies to visit [Athens]48-athens .

[A carriage]1863-a carriage was drawn up outside [Windy Corner]14-windy corner , and just as [he]133-mr. beebe caught sight of [the house]928-the house it started , bowled up [the drive]1801-the drive , and stopped abruptly when [it]1863-a carriage reached [the main road]1866-the main road . Therefore it must be the horse , who always expected [people]354-people to walk up [the hill]936-the hill in case [they]354-people tired [him]133-mr. beebe . “ How delightful ! ”[129-lucy] said [Lucy]129-lucy , in a dull voice .

“ Taste not when the wine - cup glistens , Speak not when [the people]916-the people listens , ”[129-lucy]

[she]129-lucy continued .

“ Here ’s [Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe . ”[129-lucy]

“ [Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe knows [my]129-lucy rude ways . ”[129-lucy]

“ It ’s a beautiful song and a wise one , ”[1945-mr. beebe , who loved the art of the past] said [he]1945-mr. beebe , who loved the art of the past . “ Go on . ”[1945-mr. beebe , who loved the art of the past]

“ It is n’t very good , ”[129-lucy] [she]129-lucy said listlessly . “ [I]129-lucy forget why — harmony or something . ”[129-lucy]

“ [I]129-lucy suspected it was unscholarly . It ’s so beautiful . ”[129-lucy]

“ The tune ’s right enough , ”[135-freddy] said [Freddy]135-freddy , “ but the words are rotten . Why throw up the sponge ? ”[135-freddy]

“ How stupidly [you]135-freddy talk ! ”[906-his sister] said [[his]135-freddy sister]906-his sister . [The Santa Conversazione]1951-the santa conversazione was broken up . After all , there was no reason that [Lucy]129-lucy should talk about [Greece]102-greece or thank [him]135-freddy for persuading [[her]129-lucy mother]493-her mother , so [he]135-freddy said good - bye .

[Freddy]135-freddy lit [his]135-freddy bicycle lamp for [him]135-freddy in [the porch]1953-the porch , and with [his]135-freddy usual felicity of phrase , said : “ This has been a day and a half . ”[135-freddy]

“ Stop thine ear against [the singer]3442-the singer — ”[135-freddy]

“ Wait a minute ; [she]3442-the singer is finishing . ”[135-freddy]

“ From the red gold keep [thy]129-lucy finger ; Vacant heart and hand and eye Easy live and quiet die . ”[135-freddy]

“ [I]135-freddy love weather like this , ”[135-freddy] said [Freddy]135-freddy .

[Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe passed into it .

The two main facts were clear . [She]129-lucy had behaved splendidly , and [he]133-mr. beebe had helped [her]129-lucy . [He]133-mr. beebe could not expect to master the details of so big a change in [a girl]560-a girl ’s life . If here and there [he]133-mr. beebe was dissatisfied or puzzled , [he]133-mr. beebe must acquiesce ; [she]129-lucy was choosing the better part .

“ Vacant heart and hand and eye — ”[129-lucy]

Perhaps the song stated “ the better part ”[129-lucy] rather too strongly . [He]133-mr. beebe half fancied that the soaring accompaniment — which [he]133-mr. beebe did not lose in the shout of the gale — really agreed with [Freddy]135-freddy , and was gently criticizing the words that it adorned :

“ Vacant heart and hand and eye Easy live and quiet die . ”[129-lucy]

However , for the fourth time [Windy Corner]14-windy corner lay poised below [him]133-mr. beebe — now as a beacon in the roaring tides of darkness .

Chapter XIX Lying to [Mr. Emerson

The Miss Alans]171-the miss alans were found in [[their]1955-they beloved temperance hotel near [Bloomsbury]109-bloomsbury]1956-their beloved temperance hotel near bloomsbury — [a clean , airless establishment much patronized by [provincial England]1958-provincial england]1957-a clean , airless establishment much patronized by provincial england . [They]1955-they always perched [there]382-there before crossing [the great seas]1960-the great seas , and for a week or two would fidget gently over clothes , guide - books , mackintosh squares , digestive bread , and other Continental necessaries . That there are [shops abroad]1961-shops abroad , even in [Athens]48-athens , never occurred to [them]1955-they , for [they]1955-they regarded travel as a species of warfare , only to be undertaken by [those who have been fully armed at [the Haymarket Stores]1963-the haymarket stores]1962-those who have been fully armed at the haymarket stores . [Miss Honeychurch]129-lucy , [they]1955-they trusted , would take care to equip [herself]129-lucy duly . Quinine could now be obtained in tabloids ; paper soap was a great help towards freshening up [one]424-one ’s face in [the train]2668-the train . [Lucy]129-lucy promised , a little depressed .

“ But , of course , [you]406-her daughter know all about these things , and [you]406-her daughter have [Mr. Vyse]219-mr. vyse to help [you]406-her daughter . [A gentleman]685-a gentleman is such a stand - by . ”[129-lucy]

[Mrs. Honeychurch]134-mrs. honeychurch , who had come up to [town]1966-town with [[her]134-mrs. honeychurch daughter]406-her daughter , began to drum nervously upon [her]134-mrs. honeychurch card - case .

“ [We]1955-they think it so good of [Mr. Vyse]219-mr. vyse to spare [you]406-her daughter , ”[167-miss alan] [Miss Catharine]167-miss alan continued . “ It is [not every young man who would be so unselfish . “ Or does [his]219-mr. vyse work keep [him]219-mr. vyse in [London]9-london]3444-not every young man who would be so unselfish . but perhaps he will come out and join you later on . ” “ or does his work keep him in london ? ”[166-miss teresa] said [Miss Teresa]166-miss teresa , [the more acute and less kindly of [the two sisters]1969-the two sisters]1968-the more acute and less kindly of the two sisters .

“ [No one]2230-no one will see [Lucy]129-lucy off , ”[134-mrs. honeychurch] interposed [Mrs. Honeychurch]134-mrs. honeychurch . “ [She]134-mrs. honeychurch does n’t like it . ”[134-mrs. honeychurch]

“ No , [I]129-lucy hate seeings - off , ”[129-lucy] said [Lucy]129-lucy .

“ Really ? How funny ! [I]134-mrs. honeychurch should have thought that in this case — ”[134-mrs. honeychurch]

“ Oh , [Mrs. Honeychurch]134-mrs. honeychurch , [you]134-mrs. honeychurch are n’t going ? It is such a pleasure to have met [you]134-mrs. honeychurch ! ”[134-mrs. honeychurch]

[They]1969-the two sisters escaped , and [Lucy]129-lucy said with relief : “ That ’s all right . [We]1969-the two sisters just got through that time . ”[129-lucy]

But [[her]129-lucy mother]493-her mother was annoyed . “ [I]493-her mother should be told , [dear]2190-dear , that [I]493-her mother am unsympathetic . But [I]493-her mother can not see why [you]2190-dear did n’t tell [[your]2190-dear friends]3337-your friends about [Cecil]256-cecil and be done with it . There all the time [we]1969-the two sisters had to sit fencing , and almost telling lies , and be seen through , too , [I]493-her mother dare say , which is most unpleasant . ”[493-her mother]

[Lucy]129-lucy had plenty to say in reply . [She]129-lucy described [the Miss Alans]171-the miss alans ’ character : [they]1971-they were [such gossips]1972-such gossips , and if [one]424-one told [them]1971-they , the news would be everywhere in no time .

“ But why should n’t it be everywhere in no time ? ”[129-lucy]

“ Because [I]129-lucy settled with [Cecil]256-cecil not to announce it until [I]129-lucy left [England]21-england . [I]129-lucy shall tell [them]1975-them then . It ’s much pleasanter . How wet it is ! Let ’s turn in here . ”[129-lucy]

“ Here ”[129-lucy] was [the British Museum]1974-the british museum . [Mrs. Honeychurch]134-mrs. honeychurch refused . If [they]1975-them must take shelter , let it be in [a shop]1976-a shop . [Lucy]129-lucy felt contemptuous , for [she]129-lucy was on the tack of caring for Greek sculpture , and had already borrowed a mythical dictionary from [Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe to get up the names of the goddesses and gods .

“ Oh , well , let it be [shop]3448-shop , then . Let ’s go to [Mudie ’s]110-mudie ’s . [I]129-lucy ’ll buy a guide - book . ”[129-lucy]

“ [You]129-lucy know , [Lucy]129-lucy , [you]129-lucy and [Charlotte]128-miss bartlett and [Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe all tell [me]129-lucy [I]129-lucy ’m so stupid , so [I]129-lucy suppose [I]129-lucy am , but [I]129-lucy shall never understand this hole - and - corner work . [You]129-lucy ’ve got rid of [Cecil]256-cecil — well and good , and [I]129-lucy ’m thankful [he]256-cecil ’s gone , though [I]129-lucy did feel angry for the minute . But why not announce it ? Why this hushing up and tip - toeing ? ”[129-lucy]

“ It ’s only for a few days . ”[129-lucy]

“ But why at all ? ”[129-lucy]

[Lucy]129-lucy was silent . [She]129-lucy was drifting away from [[her]129-lucy mother]493-her mother . It was quite easy to say , “ Because [George Emerson]126-george has been bothering [me]129-lucy , and if [he]126-george hears [I]129-lucy ’ve given up [Cecil]256-cecil may begin again”—quite[129-lucy] easy , and it had the incidental advantage of being true . But [she]129-lucy could not say it . [She]129-lucy disliked confidences , for they might lead to self - knowledge and to that king of terrors — Light . Ever since that last evening at [Florence]22-florence [she]129-lucy had deemed it unwise to reveal [her]129-lucy soul .

[Mrs. Honeychurch]134-mrs. honeychurch , too , was silent . [She]134-mrs. honeychurch was thinking , “ [[My]134-mrs. honeychurch daughter]3186-my daughter wo n’t answer [me]134-mrs. honeychurch ; [she]3186-my daughter would rather be with [those inquisitive old maids]3450-those inquisitive old maids than with [Freddy]135-freddy and [me]134-mrs. honeychurch . Any rag , tag , and bobtail apparently does if [she]3186-my daughter can leave [[her]3186-my daughter [home]428-home]886-her home . ”[134-mrs. honeychurch] And as in [her]134-mrs. honeychurch case thoughts never remained unspoken long , [she]134-mrs. honeychurch burst out with : “ [You]129-lucy ’re tired of [Windy Corner]14-windy corner . ”[134-mrs. honeychurch]

This was perfectly true . [Lucy]129-lucy had hoped to return to [Windy Corner]14-windy corner when [she]129-lucy escaped from [Cecil]256-cecil , but [she]129-lucy discovered that [[her]129-lucy home]886-her home existed no longer . It might exist for [Freddy]135-freddy , who still lived and thought straight , but not for one who had deliberately warped the brain . [She]129-lucy did not acknowledge that [her]129-lucy brain was warped , for the brain itself must assist in that acknowledgment , and [she]129-lucy was disordering the very instruments of life . [She]129-lucy only felt , “ [I]129-lucy do not love [George]126-george ; [I]129-lucy broke off [my]129-lucy engagement because [I]129-lucy did not love [George]126-george ; [I]129-lucy must go to [Greece]102-greece because [I]129-lucy do not love [George]126-george ; it is more important that [I]129-lucy should look up gods in the dictionary than that [I]129-lucy should help [[my]129-lucy mother]2718-my mother ; [everyone else]1565-everyone else is behaving very badly . ”[129-lucy] [She]129-lucy only felt irritable and petulant , and anxious to do what [she]129-lucy was not expected to do , and in this spirit [she]129-lucy proceeded with the conversation .

“ Oh , [mother]2196-mother , what rubbish [you]2196-mother talk ! Of course [I]129-lucy ’m not tired of [Windy Corner]14-windy corner . ”[129-lucy]

“ Then why not say so at once , instead of considering half an hour ? ”[129-lucy]

[She]129-lucy laughed faintly , “ Half a minute would be nearer . ”[129-lucy]

“ Perhaps [you]129-lucy would like to stay away from [[your]129-lucy home]3456-your home altogether ? ”[129-lucy]

“ Hush , [mother]2196-mother ! [People]354-people will hear [you]129-lucy ”[129-lucy] ; for [they]1979-they had entered [Mudie]110-mudie ’s ’s . [She]129-lucy bought [Baedeker]146-baedeker , and then continued : “ Of course [I]129-lucy want to live at [home]428-home ; but as [we]3460-we are talking about it , [I]129-lucy may as well say that [I]129-lucy shall want to be away in the future more than [I]129-lucy have been . [You]493-her mother see , [I]129-lucy come into [my]129-lucy money next year . ”[129-lucy]

Tears came into [[her]129-lucy mother]493-her mother ’s eyes .

Driven by nameless bewilderment , by what is in [older people]2333-older people termed “ eccentricity , ”[129-lucy] [Lucy]129-lucy determined to make this point clear . “ [I]129-lucy ’ve seen [the world]333-the world so little — [I]129-lucy felt so out of things in [Italy]19-italy . [I]129-lucy have seen so little of life ; [one]424-one ought to come up to [London]9-london more — not a cheap ticket like to - day , but to stop . [I]129-lucy might even share [a flat]2706-a flat for a little with [some other girl]3464-some other girl . ”[129-lucy]

“ And mess with typewriters and latch - keys , ”[134-mrs. honeychurch] exploded [Mrs. Honeychurch]134-mrs. honeychurch . “ And agitate and scream , and be carried off kicking by [the police]2472-the police . And call it a Mission — when [no one]2230-no one wants [you]3467-your ! And call it Duty — when it means that [you]3467-your ca n’t stand [[your]3467-your own [home]428-home]3468-your own home ! And call it Work — when [thousands of [men]2188-men]3470-thousands of men are starving with the competition as it is ! And then to prepare [yourself]3467-your , find [two doddering old ladies]3472-two doddering old ladies , and go abroad with [them]3472-two doddering old ladies . ”[134-mrs. honeychurch]

“ [I]129-lucy want more independence , ”[129-lucy] said [Lucy]129-lucy lamely ; [she]129-lucy knew that [she]129-lucy wanted something , and independence is a useful cry ; [we]1982-we can always say that [we]1982-we have not got it . [She]129-lucy tried to remember [her]129-lucy emotions in [Florence]22-florence : those had been sincere and passionate , and had suggested beauty rather than short skirts and latch - keys . But independence was certainly [her]129-lucy cue .

“ Very well . Take [your]3467-your independence and be gone . Rush up and down and round [the world]333-the world , and come back as thin as a lath with the bad food . Despise [the house that [[your]3467-your father]3065-your father built]3474-the house that your father built and [the garden that [he]3065-your father planted]3476-the garden that he planted , and [our]1982-we dear view — and then share [a flat]2706-a flat with [another girl]3478-another girl . ”[129-lucy]

[Lucy]129-lucy screwed up [her]129-lucy mouth and said : “ Perhaps [I]129-lucy spoke hastily . ”[129-lucy]

“ Oh , goodness ! ”[493-her mother] [[her]129-lucy mother]493-her mother flashed . “ How [you]129-lucy do remind [me]493-her mother of [Charlotte Bartlett]128-miss bartlett ! ”[493-her mother]

“ [Charlotte]128-miss bartlett ? ”[129-lucy] flashed [Lucy]129-lucy in [her]129-lucy turn , pierced at last by a vivid pain .

“ More every moment . ”[129-lucy]

“ [I]493-her mother do n’t know what [you]129-lucy mean , [mother]2196-mother ; [Charlotte]128-miss bartlett and [I]493-her mother are not the very least alike . ”[493-her mother]

“ Well , [I]129-lucy see the likeness . The same eternal worrying , the same taking back of words . [You]129-lucy and [Charlotte]128-miss bartlett trying to divide two apples among [three people]3480-three people last night might be [sisters]3233-sisters . ”[129-lucy]

“ What rubbish ! And if [you]129-lucy dislike [Charlotte]128-miss bartlett so , it ’s rather a pity [you]129-lucy asked [her]128-miss bartlett to stop . [I]493-her mother warned [you]129-lucy about [her]128-miss bartlett ; [I]493-her mother begged [you]129-lucy , implored [you]129-lucy not to , but of course it was not listened to . ”[493-her mother]

“ There [you]129-lucy go . ”[129-lucy]

“ [I]493-her mother beg [your]129-lucy pardon ? ”[493-her mother]

“ [Charlotte]128-miss bartlett again , [[my]129-lucy dear]2232-my dear ; that ’s all ; [her]128-miss bartlett very words . ”[129-lucy]

[Lucy]129-lucy clenched [her]129-lucy teeth . “ [My]129-lucy point is that [you]129-lucy ought n’t to have asked [Charlotte]128-miss bartlett to stop . [I]129-lucy wish [you]129-lucy would keep to the point . ”[129-lucy] And the conversation died off into a wrangle .

[She]129-lucy and [[her]129-lucy mother]493-her mother shopped in silence , spoke little in [the train]2668-the train , little again in [the carriage]914-the carriage , which met [them]1987-they at [Dorking Station]111-dorking station . It had poured all day and as [they]1987-they ascended through [the deep Surrey lanes]1988-the deep surrey lanes showers of water fell from the over - hanging beech - trees and rattled on the hood . [Lucy]129-lucy complained that the hood was stuffy . Leaning forward , [she]129-lucy looked out into the steaming dusk , and watched the carriage - lamp pass like a search - light over mud and leaves , and reveal nothing beautiful . “ The crush when [Charlotte]128-miss bartlett gets in will be abominable , ”[129-lucy] [she]129-lucy remarked . For [they]1987-they were to pick up [Miss Bartlett]128-miss bartlett at [Summer Street]13-summer street , where [she]128-miss bartlett had been dropped as [the carriage]914-the carriage went down , to pay a call on [[Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe ’s old mother]1990-mr. beebe ’s old mother . “ [We]1987-they shall have to sit three a side , because the trees drop , and yet it is n’t raining . Oh , for a little air ! ”[133-mr. beebe] Then [she]129-lucy listened to the horse ’s hoofs—“He has not told — [he]310-powell has not told . ”[129-lucy] That melody was blurred by [the soft road]1991-the soft road . “ Ca n’t [we]1987-they have the hood down ? ”[129-lucy] [she]129-lucy demanded , and [[her]129-lucy mother]493-her mother , with sudden tenderness , said : “ Very well , [old lady]3085-old lady , stop the horse . ”[129-lucy] And the horse was stopped , and [Lucy]129-lucy and [Powell]310-powell wrestled with the hood , and squirted water down [Mrs. Honeychurch]134-mrs. honeychurch ’s neck . But now that the hood was down , [she]129-lucy did see something that [she]129-lucy would have missed — there were no lights in the windows of [Cissie Villa]228-cissie villa , and round the garden gate [she]129-lucy fancied [she]129-lucy saw a padlock .

“ Is [that house]3484-that house to let again , [Powell]310-powell ? ”[129-lucy] [she]129-lucy called .

“ Yes , [miss]3485-miss , ”[310-powell] [he]310-powell replied .

“ Have [they]3486-they gone ? ”[129-lucy]

“ It is too far out of [town]1966-town for [the young gentleman]3488-the young gentleman , and [[his]3488-the young gentleman father]395-his father ’s rheumatism has come on , so [he]3488-the young gentleman ca n’t stop on alone , so [they]3486-they are trying to let furnished , ”[129-lucy] was the answer .

“ [They]3486-they have gone , then ? ”[129-lucy]

“ Yes , [miss]3485-miss , [they]3486-they have gone . ”[129-lucy]

[Lucy]129-lucy sank back . [The carriage]914-the carriage stopped at [the Rectory]2197-the rectory . [She]129-lucy got out to call for [Miss Bartlett]128-miss bartlett . So [the Emersons]164-the emersons had gone , and all this bother about [Greece]102-greece had been unnecessary . Waste ! That word seemed to sum up the whole of life . Wasted plans , wasted money , wasted love , and [she]128-miss bartlett had wounded [[her]128-miss bartlett mother]493-her mother . Was it possible that [she]128-miss bartlett had muddled things away ? Quite possible . [Other people]3404-other people had . When [the maid]2704-the maid opened the door , [she]2704-the maid was unable to speak , and stared stupidly into [the hall]1818-the hall .

[Miss Bartlett]128-miss bartlett at once came forward , and after a long preamble asked a great favour : might [she]128-miss bartlett go to [church]571-church ? [Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe and [[his]133-mr. beebe mother]1129-his mother had already gone , but [she]128-miss bartlett had refused to start until [she]128-miss bartlett obtained [[her]128-miss bartlett hostess]1643-her hostess ’s full sanction , for it would mean keeping the horse waiting a good ten minutes more .

“ Certainly , ”[2002-the hostess] said [the hostess]2002-the hostess wearily . “ [I]2002-the hostess forgot it was Friday . Let ’s all go . [Powell]310-powell can go round to [the stables]3491-the stables . ”[2002-the hostess]

“ [Lucy]129-lucy dearest — ”[2002-the hostess]

“ [No church for [me]2002-the hostess]3492-no church for me , thank [you]1643-her hostess . ”[2002-the hostess]

A sigh , and [they]2003-their departed . [The church]2203-the church was invisible , but up in the darkness to the left there was a hint of colour . This was a stained window , through which some feeble light was shining , and when the door opened [Lucy]129-lucy heard [Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe ’s voice running through the litany to [a minute congregation]2005-a minute congregation . Even [[their]2003-their church]2006-their church , built upon [the slope of [the hill]936-the hill]2007-the slope of the hill so artfully , with [its]2006-their church beautiful raised transept and [its]2006-their church spire of silvery shingle — even [[their]2003-their church]2006-their church had lost its charm ; and the thing one never talked about — religion — was fading like all the other things .

[She]129-lucy followed [the maid]2704-the maid into [the Rectory]2197-the rectory .

Would [she]129-lucy object to sitting in [[Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe ’s study]2012-mr. beebe ’s study ? There was only that one fire .

[She]129-lucy would not object .

[Some one]2397-some one was there already , for [Lucy]129-lucy heard the words : “ [A lady]709-a lady to wait , [sir]3494-sir . ”[2397-some one]

[Old Mr. Emerson]289-old mr. emerson was sitting by the fire , with [his]289-old mr. emerson foot upon a gout - stool .

“ Oh , [Miss Honeychurch]129-lucy , that [you]129-lucy should come ! ”[289-old mr. emerson] [he]289-old mr. emerson quavered ; and [Lucy]129-lucy saw an alteration in [him]289-old mr. emerson since last Sunday .

Not a word would come to [her]129-lucy lips . [George]126-george [she]129-lucy had faced , and could have faced again , but [she]129-lucy had forgotten how to treat [[his]126-george father]395-his father .

“ [Miss Honeychurch]129-lucy , [dear]2190-dear , [we]3496-we are so sorry ! [George]126-george is so sorry ! [He]126-george thought [he]126-george had a right to try . [I]126-george can not blame [[my]126-george boy]2374-my boy , and yet [I]126-george wish [he]126-george had told [me]126-george first . [He]126-george ought not to have tried . [I]126-george knew nothing about it at all . ”[126-george]

If only [she]129-lucy could remember how to behave !

[He]395-his father held up [his]395-his father hand . “ But [you]129-lucy must not scold [him]126-george . ”[395-his father]

[Lucy]129-lucy turned [her]129-lucy back , and began to look at [Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe ’s books .

“ [I]395-his father taught [him]126-george , ”[395-his father] [he]395-his father quavered , “ to trust in love . [I]395-his father said : ‘ When love comes , that is reality . ’ [I]395-his father said : ‘ Passion does not blind . No . Passion is sanity , and [the woman [you]395-his father love]3498-the woman you love , [she]3498-the woman you love is [the only person [you]395-his father will ever really understand]3499-the only person you will ever really understand . ’ ”[395-his father] [He]395-his father sighed : “ True , everlastingly true , though [my]395-his father day is over , and though there is the result . [Poor boy]3500-poor boy ! [He]126-george is so sorry ! [He]126-george said [he]126-george knew it was madness when [you]129-lucy brought [[your]129-lucy cousin]2401-your cousin in ; that whatever [you]129-lucy felt [you]129-lucy did not mean . [Yet”—his]317-yet”—his[395-his father] voice gathered strength : [he]395-his father spoke out to make [certain—“Miss Honeychurch]129-lucy , do [you]129-lucy remember [Italy]19-italy ? ”[395-his father]

[Lucy]129-lucy selected a book — a volume of Old Testament commentaries . Holding it up to [her]129-lucy eyes , [she]129-lucy said : “ [I]129-lucy have no wish to discuss [Italy]19-italy or any subject connected with [[your]129-lucy son]2380-your son . ”[129-lucy]

“ But [you]129-lucy do remember it ? ”[129-lucy]

“ [He]2015-he has misbehaved [himself]2015-he from the first . ”[129-lucy]

“ [I]129-lucy only was told that [he]2015-he loved [you]129-lucy last Sunday . [I]129-lucy never could judge behaviour . [I]129-lucy — [I]129-lucy — suppose [he]2015-he has . ”[129-lucy]

Feeling a little steadier , [she]129-lucy put the book back and turned round to [him]2015-he . [His]2015-he face was drooping and swollen , but [his]2015-he eyes , though they were sunken deep , gleamed with [a child]1084-a child ’s courage .

“ [Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe , could [you]133-mr. beebe help [me]133-mr. beebe ? ”[133-mr. beebe]

[He]133-mr. beebe looked amazed at the request , and said in a low , stern voice : “ [I]133-mr. beebe am more grieved than [I]133-mr. beebe can possibly express . It is lamentable , lamentable — incredible . ”[133-mr. beebe]

“ What ’s wrong with [the boy]772-the boy ? ”[2602-the other] fired up [the other]2602-the other again .

“ Nothing , [Mr. Emerson]126-george , except that [he]772-the boy no longer interests [me]133-mr. beebe . [Marry George]319-marry george , [Miss Honeychurch]129-lucy . [He]772-the boy will do admirably . ”[133-mr. beebe]

[He]133-mr. beebe walked out and left [them]2053-them . [They]2053-them heard [him]133-mr. beebe guiding [[his]133-mr. beebe mother]1129-his mother up - stairs .

“ [Lucy]129-lucy ! ”[2053-them] the voices called .

[She]1129-his mother turned to [Mr. Emerson]126-george in despair . But [his]133-mr. beebe face revived [her]1129-his mother . It was the face of [a saint who understood]2055-a saint who understood .

“ Now it is all dark . Now Beauty and Passion seem never to have existed . [I]2056-he know . But remember [the mountains over [Florence]22-florence]3579-the mountains over florence and the view . Ah , [dear]2190-dear , if [I]2056-he were [George]126-george , and gave [you]2190-dear one kiss , it would make [you]2190-dear brave . [You]2190-dear have to go cold into a battle that needs warmth , out into the muddle that [you]2190-dear have made [yourself]2190-dear ; and [[your]2190-dear mother]2183-your mother and all [[your]2190-dear friends]3337-your friends will despise [you]2190-dear , oh , [[my]2056-he darling]3583-my darling , and rightly , if it is ever right to despise . [George]126-george still dark , all the tussle and the misery without a word from [him]126-george . Am [I]2056-he justified ? ”[2056-he] Into [his]2056-he own eyes tears came . “ Yes , for [we]3584-we fight for more than Love or Pleasure ; there is Truth . Truth counts , Truth does count . ”[2056-he]

“ [You]2056-he kiss [me]381-the girl , ”[381-the girl] said [the girl]381-the girl . “ [You]2056-he kiss [me]381-the girl . [I]381-the girl will try . ”[381-the girl]

[He]2056-he gave [her]381-the girl a sense of deities reconciled , a feeling that , in gaining [the man [she]381-the girl loved]1373-the man she loved , [she]381-the girl would gain something for [the whole world]660-the whole world . Throughout the squalor of [[her]381-the girl homeward drive]2060-her homeward drive — [she]381-the girl spoke at once — [his]2056-he salutation remained . [He]2056-he had robbed the body of its taint , [the world]333-the world ’s taunts of [their]2062-they sting ; [he]2056-he had shown [her]381-the girl the holiness of direct desire . [She]381-the girl “ never exactly understood , ”[381-the girl] [she]381-the girl would say in after years , “ how [he]2056-he managed to strengthen [her]381-the girl . It was as if [he]2056-he had made [her]381-the girl see the whole of everything at once . ”[381-the girl]

Chapter XX The End of the Middle Ages

[The Miss Alans]171-the miss alans did go to [Greece]102-greece , but [they]2062-they went by [themselves]2062-they . [They]2062-they alone of [this little company]2063-this little company will double [Malea]112-malea and plough [the waters of [the Saronic gulf]2065-the saronic gulf]2064-the waters of the saronic gulf . [They]2062-they alone will visit [Athens]48-athens and [Delphi]108-delphi , and either shrine of intellectual song — that upon [the Acropolis]113-the acropolis , encircled by [blue seas]2066-blue seas ; that under [Parnassus]114-parnassus , where the eagles build and [the bronze charioteer]2067-the bronze charioteer drives undismayed towards infinity . Trembling , anxious , cumbered with much digestive bread , [they]2062-they did proceed to [Constantinople]103-constantinople , [they]2062-they did go round [the world]333-the world . [The rest of [us]2070-us]2069-the rest of us must be contented with a fair , but a less arduous , goal . [Italiam petimus]320-italiam petimus : [we]2070-us return to [the Pension Bertolini]2071-the pension bertolini .

[George]126-george said it was [[his]126-george old room]2072-his old room .

“ No , it is n’t , ”[129-lucy] said [Lucy]129-lucy ; “ because it is [the room [I]129-lucy had]3585-the room i had , and [I]129-lucy had [[[your]126-george father]3065-your father ’s room]3587-your father ’s room . [I]129-lucy forget why ; [Charlotte]128-miss bartlett made [me]129-lucy , for some reason . ”[129-lucy]

[He]126-george knelt on the tiled floor , and laid [his]126-george face in [her]129-lucy lap .

“ [George]126-george , [[you]126-george baby]3588-you baby , get up . ”[126-george]

“ Why should n’t [I]126-george be [a baby]2365-a baby ? ”[126-george] murmured [George]126-george .

Unable to answer this question , [she]129-lucy put down [his]126-george sock , which [she]129-lucy was trying to mend , and gazed out through the window . It was evening and again the spring .

“ Oh , bother [Charlotte]128-miss bartlett , ”[129-lucy] [she]129-lucy said thoughtfully . “ What can [such people]3590-such people be made of ? ”[129-lucy]

“ Same stuff as parsons are made of . ”[129-lucy]

“ Nonsense ! ”[129-lucy]

“ Quite right . It is nonsense . ”[129-lucy]

“ Now [you]126-george get up off the cold floor , or [you]126-george ’ll be starting rheumatism next , and [you]126-george stop laughing and being so silly . ”[129-lucy]

“ Why should n’t [I]126-george laugh ? ”[126-george] [he]126-george asked , pinning [her]129-lucy with [his]126-george elbows , and advancing [his]126-george face to [hers]129-lucy . “ What ’s there to cry at ? Kiss [me]126-george here . ”[126-george] [He]126-george indicated the spot where a kiss would be welcome .

[He]126-george was [a boy]2719-a boy after all . When it came to the point , it was [she]129-lucy who remembered the past , [she]129-lucy into whose soul the iron had entered , [she]129-lucy who knew whose room this had been last year . It endeared [him]126-george to [her]129-lucy strangely that [he]126-george should be sometimes wrong .

“ Any letters ? ”[126-george] [he]126-george asked .

“ Just a line from [Freddy]135-freddy . ”[126-george]

“ Now kiss [me]126-george here ; then here . ”[126-george]

Then , threatened again with rheumatism , [he]126-george strolled to the window , opened it ( as the English will ) , and leant out . There was [the parapet]2074-the parapet , there [the river]456-the river , there to the left [the beginnings of [the hills]657-the hills]2076-the beginnings of the hills . [The cab - driver]2414-the cab - driver , who at once saluted [him]126-george with the hiss of a serpent , might be [that very Phaethon who had set this happiness in motion]2079-that very phaethon who had set this happiness in motion twelve months ago . A passion of gratitude — all feelings grow to passions in [the South]18-the south — came over [the husband]2080-the husband , and [he]126-george blessed [the people]916-the people and the things who had taken so much trouble about [a young fool]2082-a young fool . [He]126-george had helped [himself]126-george , it is true , but how stupidly !

All the fighting that mattered had been done by [others]708-others — by [Italy]19-italy , by [[his]126-george father]395-his father , by [[his]126-george wife]2533-his wife .

“ [Lucy]129-lucy , [you]129-lucy come and look at the cypresses ; and [the church]2203-the church , whatever [its]2203-the church name is , still shows . ”[126-george]

“ [San Miniato]32-san miniato . [I]126-george ’ll just finish [your]129-lucy sock . ”[126-george]

“ Signorino , domani faremo uno giro , ”[2086-the cabman] called [the cabman]2086-the cabman , with engaging certainty .

[George]126-george told [him]2086-the cabman that [he]2086-the cabman was mistaken ; [they]2087-i had no money to throw away on driving .

And [the people who had not meant to help]2088-the people who had not meant to help — [the Miss Lavishes]321-the miss lavishes , [the Cecils]322-the cecils , [the Miss Bartletts]323-the miss bartletts ! Ever prone to magnify [Fate]202-fate , [George]126-george counted up the forces that had swept [him]126-george into this contentment .

“ Anything good in [Freddy]135-freddy ’s letter ? ”[2087-i]

“ Not yet . ”[126-george]

[His]126-george own content was absolute , but [hers]2089-hers held bitterness : [the Honeychurches]227-the honeychurches had not forgiven [them]2087-i ; [they]2087-i were disgusted at [her]2089-hers past hypocrisy ; [she]2089-hers had alienated [Windy Corner]14-windy corner , perhaps for ever .

“ What does [he]135-freddy say ? ”[2087-i]

“ [Silly boy]3592-silly boy ! [He]135-freddy thinks [he]135-freddy ’s being dignified . [He]135-freddy knew [we]3593-us should go off in the spring — [he]135-freddy has known it for six months — that if [mother]2196-mother would n’t give [her]2196-mother consent [we]3593-us should take the thing into [our]3593-us own hands . [They]2087-i had fair warning , and now [he]135-freddy calls it an elopement . [Ridiculous boy]3595-ridiculous boy — ”[2087-i]

“ [Signorino]324-signorino , [domani faremo uno giro]3596-domani faremo uno giro — ”[2087-i]

“ But it will all come right in the end . [He]135-freddy has to build [us]3593-us both up from the beginning again . [I]2087-i wish , though , that [Cecil]256-cecil had not turned so cynical about [women]2187-women . [He]135-freddy has , for the second time , quite altered . Why will [men]2188-men have theories about [women]2187-women ? [I]2087-i have n’t any about [men]2188-men . [I]2087-i wish , too , that [Mr. Beebe]133-mr. beebe — ”[2087-i]

“ [You]2087-i may well wish that . ”[2087-i]

“ [He]135-freddy will never forgive [us]3593-us — [I]2087-i mean , [he]135-freddy will never be interested in [us]3593-us again . [I]2087-i wish that [he]135-freddy did not influence [them]2188-men so much at [Windy Corner]14-windy corner . [I]2087-i wish [he]135-freddy hadn’t — But if [we]3593-us act the truth , [the people who really love [us]3593-us]3601-the people who really love us are sure to come back to [us]3593-us in the long run . ”[2087-i]

“ Perhaps . ”[2090-he] Then [he]2090-he said more gently : “ Well , [I]2090-he acted the truth — the only thing [I]2090-he did do — and [you]2092-you came back to [me]2090-he . So possibly [you]2092-you know . ”[2090-he] [He]2090-he turned back into [the room]373-the room . “ Nonsense with that sock . ”[2090-he] [He]2090-he carried [her]2092-you to the window , so that [she]2092-you , too , saw all the view . [They]2093-they sank upon [their]2093-they knees , invisible from [the road]455-the road , [they]2093-they hoped , and began to whisper [one another]2371-one another ’s names . Ah ! it was worth while ; it was the great joy that [they]2093-they had expected , and countless little joys of which [they]2093-they had never dreamt . [They]2093-they were silent .

“ [Signorino]324-signorino , [domani faremo]3602-domani faremo — ”[2093-they]

“ Oh , bother [that man]2502-that man ! ”[129-lucy]

But [Lucy]129-lucy remembered the vendor of photographs and said , “ No , do n’t be rude to [him]2502-that man . ”[129-lucy] Then with a catching of [her]129-lucy breath , [she]129-lucy murmured : “ [Mr. Eager]169-mr. eager and [Charlotte]128-miss bartlett , dreadful frozen [Charlotte]128-miss bartlett . How cruel [she]128-miss bartlett would be to [a man like that]3604-a man like that ! ”[129-lucy]

“ Look at the lights going over [the bridge]656-the bridge . ”[2093-they]

“ But [this room]3606-this room reminds [me]129-lucy of [Charlotte]128-miss bartlett . How horrible to grow old in [[Charlotte]128-miss bartlett ’s way]3607-charlotte ’s way ! To think that evening at [the rectory]2197-the rectory that [she]128-miss bartlett should n’t have heard [[your]129-lucy father]3065-your father was in [the house]928-the house . For [she]128-miss bartlett would have stopped [me]129-lucy going in , and [he]3065-your father was [the only person alive who could have made [me]129-lucy see sense]3611-the only person alive who could have made me see sense . [You]129-lucy could n’t have made [me]129-lucy . When [I]129-lucy am very happy”—she[129-lucy] kissed [him—“I]129-lucy remember on how little it all hangs . If [Charlotte]128-miss bartlett had only known , [she]128-miss bartlett would have stopped [me]2093-they going in , and [I]2093-they should have gone to silly [Greece]102-greece , and become different for ever . ”[2093-they]

“ But [she]128-miss bartlett did know , ”[126-george] said [George]126-george ; “ [she]128-miss bartlett did see [[my]126-george father]2255-my father , surely . [He]3065-your father said so . ”[126-george]

“ Oh , no , [she]128-miss bartlett did n’t see [him]3065-your father . [She]128-miss bartlett was [upstairs]3004-upstairs with [old Mrs. Beebe]325-old mrs. beebe , do n’t [you]126-george remember , and then went straight to [the church]2203-the church . [She]128-miss bartlett said so . ”[2093-they]

[George]126-george was obstinate again . “ [[My]126-george father]2255-my father , ”[126-george] said [he]126-george , “ saw [her]128-miss bartlett , and [I]126-george prefer [his]2255-my father word . [He]2255-my father was dozing by the study fire , and [he]2255-my father opened [his]2255-my father eyes , and there was [Miss Bartlett]128-miss bartlett . A few minutes before [you]126-george came in . [She]128-miss bartlett was turning to go as [he]2255-my father woke up . [He]2255-my father did n’t speak to [her]128-miss bartlett . ”[126-george]

Then [they]2096-they spoke of other things — the desultory talk of those who have been fighting to reach [one another]2371-one another , and whose reward is to rest quietly in [each other]666-each other ’s arms . It was long ere [they]2096-they returned to [Miss Bartlett]128-miss bartlett , but when [they]2096-they did [her]128-miss bartlett behaviour seemed more interesting . [George]126-george , who disliked any darkness , said : “ It ’s clear that [she]128-miss bartlett knew . Then , why did [she]128-miss bartlett risk the meeting ? [She]128-miss bartlett knew [he]2255-my father was [there]382-there , and yet [she]128-miss bartlett went to [church]571-church . ”[126-george]

[They]2096-they tried to piece the thing together .

As [they]2096-they talked , an incredible solution came into [Lucy]129-lucy ’s mind . [She]129-lucy rejected it , and said : “ How like [Charlotte]128-miss bartlett to undo [her]128-miss bartlett work by a feeble muddle at the last moment . ”[129-lucy] But something in the dying evening , in the roar of [the river]456-the river , in [their]2096-they very embrace warned [them]2096-they that [her]128-miss bartlett words fell short of life , and [George]126-george whispered : “ Or did [she]128-miss bartlett mean it ? ”[126-george]

“ Mean what ? ”[129-lucy]

“ [Signorino]324-signorino , domani faremo uno giro — ”[126-george]

[Lucy]129-lucy bent forward and said with gentleness : “ [Lascia]326-lascia , prego , lascia . Siamo sposati . ”[129-lucy]

“ Scusi tanto , [signora]3618-signora , ”[126-george] [he]126-george replied in tones as gentle and whipped up [his]126-george horse .

“ [Buona sera]327-buona sera — e grazie . ”[126-george]

“ Niente . ”[126-george]

[The cabman]2086-the cabman drove away singing .

“ Mean what , [George]126-george ? ”[126-george]

[He]126-george whispered : “ Is it this ? Is this possible ? [I]126-george ’ll put a marvel to [you]126-george . That [[your]126-george cousin]2401-your cousin has always hoped . That from the very first moment [we]2096-they met , [she]128-miss bartlett hoped , far down in [her]128-miss bartlett mind , that [we]2096-they should be like this — of course , very far down . That [she]128-miss bartlett fought [us]2096-they on the surface , and yet [she]128-miss bartlett hoped . [I]126-george ca n’t explain [her]128-miss bartlett any other way . Can [you]126-george ? Look how [she]128-miss bartlett kept [me]126-george alive in [you]126-george all the summer ; how [she]128-miss bartlett gave [you]126-george no peace ; how month after month [she]128-miss bartlett became more eccentric and unreliable . The sight of [us]2096-they haunted [her]128-miss bartlett — or [she]128-miss bartlett could n’t have described [us]2096-they as [she]128-miss bartlett did to [[her]128-miss bartlett friend]3620-her friend . There are details — it burnt . [I]126-george read the book afterwards . [She]128-miss bartlett is not frozen , [Lucy]129-lucy , [she]128-miss bartlett is not withered up all through . [She]128-miss bartlett tore [us]2096-they apart twice , but in [the rectory]2197-the rectory that evening [she]128-miss bartlett was given one more chance to make [us]2096-they happy . [We]2096-they can never make [friends]3622-friends with [her]128-miss bartlett or thank [her]128-miss bartlett . But [I]126-george do believe that , far down in [her]128-miss bartlett heart , far below all speech and behaviour , [she]128-miss bartlett is glad . ”[126-george]

“ It is impossible , ”[129-lucy] murmured [Lucy]129-lucy , and then , remembering the experiences of [her]129-lucy own heart , [she]129-lucy said : “ No — it is just possible . ”[129-lucy]

[Youth]235-youth enwrapped [them]2101-they ; the song of [Phaethon]200-phaethon announced passion requited , love attained . But [they]2101-they were conscious of a love more mysterious than this . The song died away ; [they]2101-they heard [the river]456-the river , bearing down the snows of winter into [the Mediterranean]115-the mediterranean .

Additional terms will be linked to the Project Gutenberg ™ License for all works posted with the permission of [the copyright holder]2122-the copyright holder found at the beginning of this work .

1.E.4 . Do not unlink or detach or remove the full Project Gutenberg ™ License terms from this work , or any files containing a part of this work or any other work associated with Project Gutenberg ™ .

1.E.5 . Do not copy , display , perform , distribute or redistribute this electronic work , or any part of this electronic work , without prominently displaying the sentence set forth in paragraph 1.E.1 with active links or immediate access to the full terms of the Project Gutenberg ™ License .

1.E.6 . [You]2105-you may convert to and distribute this work in any binary , compressed , marked up , nonproprietary or proprietary form , including any word processing or hypertext form . However , if [you]2105-you provide access to or distribute copies of a Project Gutenberg ™ work in a format other than “ Plain Vanilla ASCII ”[328-www.gutenberg.org] or other format used in the official version posted on [the official Project Gutenberg ™ website]2127-the official project gutenberg ™ website ( [www.gutenberg.org]328-www.gutenberg.org ) , [you]2105-you must , at no additional cost , fee or expense to [the user]2128-the user , provide a copy , a means of exporting a copy , or a means of obtaining a copy upon request , of the work in [its]2121-an individual project gutenberg ™ electronic work original “ Plain Vanilla ASCII ”[2105-you] or other form . Any alternate format must include the full Project Gutenberg ™ License as specified in paragraph 1.E.1 .

1.E.7 . Do not charge a fee for access to , viewing , displaying , performing , copying or distributing any Project Gutenberg ™ works unless [you]2105-you comply with paragraph 1.E.8 or 1.E.9 .

• [You]2105-you pay a royalty fee of 20 % of the gross profits [you]2105-you derive from the use of Project Gutenberg ™ works calculated using the method [you]2105-you already use to calculate [your]2105-you applicable taxes . 1.F.

1.F.1 . Project Gutenberg volunteers and [employees]2135-employees expend considerable effort to identify , do copyright research on , transcribe and proofread works not protected by U.S. copyright law in creating the Project Gutenberg ™ collection . Despite these efforts , Project Gutenberg ™ electronic works , and the medium on which they may be stored , may contain “ Defects , ”[None-None] such as , but not limited to , incomplete , inaccurate or corrupt data , transcription errors , a copyright or other intellectual property infringement , a defective or damaged disk or other medium , a computer virus , or computer codes that damage or can not be read by [your]2105-you equipment .

1.F.2 . LIMITED WARRANTY , DISCLAIMER OF DAMAGES - Except for the “ Right of Replacement or Refund ”[None-None] described in paragraph 1.F.3 , the Project Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation , [the owner of the Project Gutenberg ™ trademark]2129-the owner of the project gutenberg ™ trademark , and [any other party distributing a Project Gutenberg]2137-any other party distributing a project gutenberg ™ electronic work under this agreement , disclaim all liability to [you]2105-you for damages , costs and expenses , including legal fees . [YOU]2105-you AGREE THAT [YOU]2105-you HAVE NO REMEDIES FOR NEGLIGENCE , STRICT LIABILITY , BREACH OF WARRANTY OR BREACH OF CONTRACT EXCEPT THOSE PROVIDED IN PARAGRAPH 1.F.3 . [YOU]2105-you AGREE THAT THE FOUNDATION , THE TRADEMARK OWNER , AND ANY DISTRIBUTOR UNDER THIS AGREEMENT WILL NOT BE LIABLE TO [YOU]2105-you FOR ACTUAL , DIRECT , INDIRECT , CONSEQUENTIAL , PUNITIVE OR INCIDENTAL DAMAGES EVEN IF [YOU]2105-you GIVE NOTICE OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE .

1.F.3 . LIMITED RIGHT OF REPLACEMENT OR REFUND - If [you]2105-you discover a defect in this electronic work within 90 days of receiving it , [you]2105-you can receive a refund of the money ( if any ) [you]2105-you paid for it by sending a written explanation to [the person [you]2105-you received the work from]2138-the person you received the work from . If [you]2105-you received the work on a physical medium , [you]2105-you must return the medium with [your]2105-you written explanation . [The person]2139-the person or entity that provided [you]2105-you with the defective work may elect to provide a replacement copy in lieu of a refund . If [you]2105-you received the work electronically , [the person or entity providing it to [you]2105-you]2140-the person or entity providing it to you may choose to give [you]2105-you a second opportunity to receive the work electronically in lieu of a refund . If the second copy is also defective , [you]2105-you may demand a refund in writing without further opportunities to fix the problem .

1.F.4 . Except for the limited right of replacement or refund set forth in paragraph 1.F.3 , this work is provided to [you]2105-you ‘ AS - IS ’ , WITH NO OTHER WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND , EXPRESS OR IMPLIED , INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR ANY PURPOSE .

1.F.5 . [Some states]2141-some states do not allow disclaimers of certain implied warranties or the exclusion or limitation of certain types of damages . If any disclaimer or limitation set forth in this agreement violates the law of [the state]2142-the state applicable to this agreement , the agreement shall be interpreted to make the maximum disclaimer or limitation permitted by the applicable state law . The invalidity or unenforceability of any provision of this agreement shall not void the remaining provisions .

Section 2 . Information about the Mission of Project Gutenberg ™

Project Gutenberg ™ is synonymous with the free distribution of electronic works in formats readable by the widest variety of computers including obsolete , old , middle - aged and new computers . It exists because of the efforts of [hundreds of volunteers]2148-hundreds of volunteers and donations from [people in all walks of life]2149-people in all walks of life .

[Volunteers]2150-volunteers and financial support to provide [volunteers]2150-volunteers with the assistance [they]2150-volunteers need are critical to reaching Project Gutenberg ™ ’s goals and ensuring that the Project Gutenberg ™ collection will remain freely available for [generations]2152-generations to come . In 2001 , [the Project Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation]2131-the project gutenberg literary archive foundation was created to provide a secure and permanent future for Project Gutenberg ™ and [future generations]2154-future generations . To learn more about the Project Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation and how [your]2105-you efforts and donations can help , see Sections 3 and 4 and the Foundation information page at www.gutenberg.org .

Section 4 . Information about Donations to the Project Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation

Project Gutenberg ™ depends upon and can not survive without widespread public support and donations to carry out [its]2155-the project gutenberg literary archive foundation the project gutenberg literary archive foundation mission of increasing the number of public domain and licensed works that can be freely distributed in machine - readable form accessible by the widest array of equipment including outdated equipment . Many small donations ( $ 1 to $ 5,000 ) are particularly important to maintaining tax exempt status with [the IRS]121-the irs .

[The Foundation]122-the foundation is committed to complying with the laws regulating charities and charitable donations in [all 50 states of [the United States]116-the united states]2164-all 50 states of the united states . Compliance requirements are not uniform and it takes a considerable effort , much paperwork and many fees to meet and keep up with these requirements . [We]2165-we do not solicit donations in locations where [we]2165-we have not received written confirmation of compliance . To SEND DONATIONS or determine the status of compliance for [any particular state]2166-any particular state visit www.gutenberg.org/donate .

While [we]2165-we can not and do not solicit contributions from [states where [we]2165-we have not met the solicitation requirements]2167-states where we have not met the solicitation requirements , [we]2165-we know of no prohibition against accepting unsolicited donations from donors in [such states who approach [us]2165-we with offers to donate]2168-such states who approach us with offers to donate .

International donations are gratefully accepted , but [we]2165-we can not make any statements concerning tax treatment of donations received from outside [the United States]116-the united states . U.S. laws alone swamp [[our]2165-we small staff]2169-our small staff .

Please check the Project Gutenberg web pages for current donation methods and addresses . Donations are accepted in a number of other ways including checks , online payments and credit card donations . To donate , please visit : www.gutenberg.org/donate .

Section 5 . General Information About Project [Gutenberg]329-gutenberg ™ electronic works

Professor [Michael S. Hart]179-s. was the originator of the Project Gutenberg ™ concept of a library of electronic works that could be freely shared with [anyone]2170-anyone . For forty years , [he]179-s. produced and distributed Project Gutenberg ™ eBooks with only a loose network of volunteer support .

Project Gutenberg ™ eBooks are often created from several printed editions , all of which are confirmed as not protected by copyright in the U.S. unless a copyright notice is included . Thus , [we]2165-we do not necessarily keep [eBooks]2171-ebooks in compliance with any particular paper edition .

[Most people]2172-most people start at [our]2165-we website which has [the main PG search facility]2173-the main pg search facility : www.gutenberg.org .

This website includes information about Project Gutenberg ™ , including how to make donations to the Project Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation , how to help produce [our]2165-we new eBooks , and how to subscribe to [our]2165-we email newsletter to hear about new eBooks .
